scripts.deploy: aws s3 sync build/ s3://emon-teacher --cache-control max-age=31536000,public && aws s3 cp s3://emon-teacher/service-worker.js s3:/emon-teacher/service-worker.js --metadata-directive REPLACE --cache-control max-age=0,no-cache,no-store,must-revalidate --content-type application/javascript && aws s3 cp s3://emon-teacher/index.html s3://emon-teacher/index.html --metadata-directive REPLACE --cache-control max-age=0,no-cache,no-store,must-revalidate --content-type text/html
scripts.postdeploy: aws cloudfront create-invalidation --distribution-id E29A3DV9K1DK8P --paths /index.html && aws cloudfront create-invalidation --distribution-id E29A3DV9K1DK8P --paths /service-worker.js
